jspsych-instructions.description: If checked, then trial will end when subject responds

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: Each element in the array is the content for a single page.

parameters.name: button_label_previous
parameters.description: The text that appears on the button to go backwards

parameters.name: button_label_next
parameters.description: The text that appears on the button to go forwards

parameters.name: key_forward
parameters.description: The key that the subject can press to advance to the next page.

parameters.name: key_backward
parameters.description: The key that the subject can press to return to the previous page.

parameters.name: allow_backward
parameters.description: If checked, the subject can return to the previous page of the instructions

parameters.name: allow_keys
parameters.description: If checked, the subject can use keyboard keys to navigate the pages.

parameters.name: show_clickable_nav
parameters.description: If checked, If checked, then a Previous and Next button will be displayed beneath the instructions.

parameters.name: show_page_number
parameters.description: If checked, and clickable navigation is enabled, then a Page x/y will be shown before the nave buttons

jspsych-image-button-response.description: If checked, then trial will end when subject responds

parameters.name: stimulus_height
parameters.description: Set the image height in pixels

parameters.name: stimulus_width
parameters.description: Set the image width in pixels

parameters.name: maintain_aspect_ratio
parameters.description: Maintain the aspect ratio after setting width or height

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Any content here will be displayed under the buttons

parameters.name: choices
parameters.description: An array of labels for the buttons

parameters.name: button_html
parameters.description: The html of the button. Usually used to style the button.

parameters.name: stimulus_duration
parameters.description: How long to hide the stimulus

parameters.name: trial_duration
parameters.description: How long to show the trial

parameters.name: response_ends_trial
parameters.description: If checked, then trial will end when subject responds
